settings.newsletter_title: Want to one-up that youthfully vibrant glow?
settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to be the first to know about new products to help you age gracefully.

settings.newsletter_title: Want to one-up that youthfully vibrant glow?
settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to be the first to know about new products to help you age gracefully.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.content:
We come with good news: with modern advancements in skin care, there’s no reason we can’t expect a little bit more from our skin as we get older.

Learn more

settings.title: Radiance Reboot.
settings.subtitle: Just a few minutes with our skincare routine, and you can get on with your day ― science-backed ingredients for a natural glow.

settings.custom_html: Follow us on Instagram @sdara.skincare

settings.title: How often should you use the Microneedle Roller?
settings.subtitle: It really depends on the individual and how sensitive your skin is. Normally once or twice a week should be a good starting point! If your skin is not sensitive and reacts well to the first session, you can use up to 3 times a week, with a break in between each session.

settings.title: How do you use the Microneedle Roller ?
settings.subtitle:
1. Sterilize roller in alcohol solution before and after each use.

2. Wash and pat skin dry. Do not puncture skin but apply pressure.

3. Roll back and forth in desired area for 4 - 5 times. Switch direction.

4. Apply moisturizer or repairing serum after use. Use once a week for optimal results.

5. Replace roller once every 1 - 2 months if using frequently and store in plastic case.

settings.title: Which microneedle size is best?
settings.subtitle: A microneedle size less than .3mm is considered safe for home use. Anything longer than .3mm could actually damage your skin.

settings.title: How do I clean my Microneedle Roller?
settings.subtitle: Sanitize the head in alcohol solution for 5-10 minutes before and after each use. Rinse with water after.

settings.title: What percentage is the Vitamin C Serum?
settings.subtitle: The Vitamin C Serum has 20% Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphphate (Vitamin C) and 2% Hyaluronic Acid.

settings.title: When is the best time to use my Vitamin C Serum?
settings.subtitle: Our Vitamin C Serum is best used at night before bed or in the morning before applying your moisturizer and makeup.

settings.title: What is the difference between Marine Collagen and Collagen Peptides?
settings.subtitle: Our Marine Collagen is sourced from wild-caught Snapper. Our Collagen Peptides is sourced from grass-fed bovine hides.

settings.title: What is the size of the container?
settings.subtitle:
For the Marine Collagen : The container has approximately 28 servings (1 scoop = 12g) and the total net weight of the container is 340g or 11.99oz. 

For the Collagen Peptides: The container has approximately 41 servings (1 scoop = 11g) and the total net weight of the container is 454g or 16oz.

settings.title: Is your Collagen third-party tested?
settings.subtitle: Yes our Collagen is tested by a third party company through our supplier.

settings.title: Are you cruelty-free?
settings.subtitle: We do not test our products on animals and are cruelty-free. We love our furry friends and would never do anything to harm them.

settings.title: Will my products expire?
settings.subtitle: All topical or consumable products have an expiration date on the bottom of the bottle or on the box.

settings.title: Do you offer discounts or special promotions?
settings.subtitle: We have a great Subscribe & Save program where you get great savings on reoccurring purchases! If you love our products this is great way to save money.

settings.title: What is the typical order processing time?
settings.subtitle: Orders are typically processed in 24hrs. If you order on a weekend, your order will be processed on the next business day.

settings.title: What shipping options do you have?
settings.subtitle:
For orders shipped within the USA, customers have the following options:

Standard (Ground) = 1 day processing and 5 - 8 business days shipping

Expedited = 1 day processing and 3 - 5 business days shipping

Priority = 1 day processing and 2 - 3 business days shipping

Customers with orders shipped to Alaska and Hawaii will be charged standard rate shipping. Priority and Expedited are not available for P.O. Box addresses.

For orders shipped to Canada, customers have the following options:

DHL International = 14 - 21 business days shipping, depending on location

For orders shipped to Australia, Belgium, Brazil, China, Denmark, Estonia, India, France, Great Britain, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Sweden customers have the following options:

DHL International = 14 - 21 business days shipping, depending on location

settings.title: Page FAQ Template
settings.subtitle: Create an amazing FAQ page with a full-width banner

settings.title: The Difference Between Like & Love
settings.subtitle: Step aside topical creams and mists, replenishing collagen is an inside job. Our Marine Collagen goes where it’s needed most to help you look and feel your best. Beyond boosting luminosity in your complexion, it works to support connective tissue.

settings.title: What is Marine Collagen?
settings.text: With 18 essential amino acids in the mix, it’s an optimal source of vitamins and minerals. An age gracefully essential, marine collagen improves vitality by supporting muscle, bone, and tissue. Add this game-changer to your skincare routine, and it's a one-and-done daily supplement you’ll never want to go without.

settings.title: Key Benefits
settings.text:
•  Fortified with 18 essential amino acids

•  11g of protein per serving

•  Unflavored and water-soluble

•  30-day money back guarantee

settings.custom_html: See What Our Customers Are Saying

settings.benefits:
■ Easily absorbed by the body (Highly bioavailable)

■ Supports skin, muscle, bone, and tissue

■ Non-GMO. Gluten-free. Halal and pescatarian friendly.

■ Promotes a youthful-looking glow
settings.how_to_use:
1. Put one scoop in a glass/shaker bottle

2. Add a small amount of liquid, stir thoroughly

3. Pour in 8 oz. of hot or cold fluid

4. Stir until mixture dissolves.

5. Enjoy!

**Mixes best in hot flavoured drinks (coffee), or blended in a smoothie**

settings.title: Visible Results in 4 Weeks
settings.text: Our bestselling Microneedle Roller was born to promote healthy-looking skin. This customer started using our roller and "Within 2 weeks, I saw noticeable results... I use the roller, vitamin c serum and a light moisturizer."

settings.title: Results After 1 Week
settings.text: "Day one of using this product: I started off by cleansing my face at night, then used the Sdara Derma Roller (which left my skin with a tingly, though not at all painful, sensation), and finally applied my moisturizers and serums that I could literally feel were being soaked into my pores. The next day, my skin had totally changed!" - melbd

settings.title: The Difference Between Like & Love
settings.subtitle: Our obsession with aging gracefully goes deep. But going broke on expensive clinical treatments is not how we roll. Whether you use the Microneedle Skin Roller once a week or a few times a month, looking your best at a fraction of the cost is just plain savvy.

settings.custom_html: See What Our Customers Are Saying

settings.benefits:
■ Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

■ Improves the appearance of acne scarring and hyperpigmentation 

■ Aids in the delivery of your skincare products (products absorb more effectively!)

■ Exfoliates dead skin cells and promotes a healthy glow

■ Length (0.25mm) recommended by dermatologists for home use
settings.how_to_use:
For best results, use the Sdara Microneedle Skin Roller in combination with our Vitamin C Serum once a week. And follow these step to a tee.

1. Sterilize roller in alcohol before/after each use.

2. Wash your skin - pat dry.

3. Roll back and forth over skin 4-5 times.

4. Carefully apply pressure without puncturing the skin.

5. Switch direction, roll back and forth another 4-5 times.

6. When finished, apply moisturizer or repairing serum.

7. Sanitize and store in the plastic case we provided.

8. Replace roller every 1-2 months with regular use.

settings.title: The Difference Between Like & Love
settings.subtitle: A little TLC goes a long way in enhancing the skin’s natural glow. An essential part of our aging gracefully lineup, we curate each one of our skin-loving ingredients to put dry skin, fine lines, and puffiness on notice.

settings.title: What is an Eye Gel Mask?
settings.text: From snow mushroom extract and 24k gold to peptides and hyaluronic acid, the deeply restorative ingredients are packed with natural repairing properties to slow down the signs of aging and return that well-rested spark to your eyes. Formulated to improve moisturize and firmness around the eyes, consider those late nights at the office and I’ll-sleep-when-I’m-seventy weekends covered.

settings.title: Key Benefits
settings.text:
•  Non-irritating – it won’t burn the gentle area around the eyes

•  Free of scary chemicals

•  Suitable for all skin types

•  Preventative action on the go

settings.custom_html: See What Our Customers Are Saying

settings.benefits:
■ The science-backed formula helps you age gracefully

■ Free of parabens, sulfates, fragrance, and dyes

■ Treatment targets both over and under the eye

■ Snow Mushroom pulls moisture into the skin
settings.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Tremella Fuciformis (Snow Mushroom) Extract, Ceratonia Siliqua Gum, Sodium Carrageenan, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Citrate, Mica, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, Polysorbate 20, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Gold
settings.how_to_use:
1. Clean skin and pat dry.

2. Apply top of the mask just above the eyelid and between eyebrows – press firmly in place.

3. Apply bottom of the mask to under eye area - from outside corner to inside corner—press firmly.

4. Remove after 25-30 minutes.

5. Gently tap any excess serum into the area around eyes.

settings.title: The Difference Between Like & Love
settings.subtitle: This age-defying supplement deeply nourishes in a way topical creams never can.  A glowing, healthy, and supple complexion from the inside out? Yes and please!

settings.title: What is Collagen Peptides?
settings.text: There was no question when we set out to create this nutrient-rich powder formula - it had to be made from the best grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine hides available. We designed it for optimal absorption, so it goes to work fast - replenishing collagen stores lost through those extra years.

settings.title: Key Benefits
settings.text:
•  Convenience! Can even be added to soup, yogurt, and oatmeal

•  11g of Collagen per serving

•  Hair, skin and nails bliss

•  30-day money back guarantee

settings.custom_html: See What Our Customers Are Saying

settings.benefits:
■ Helps you age gracefully at the cell level

■ Replenishes collagen naturally

■ Made from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine hides

■ Bioavailable for easy absorption
settings.how_to_use:
1. Put one scoop in a glass/shaker bottle

2. Add a small amount of liquid, stir thoroughly

3. Pour in 8 oz. of hot or cold fluid

4. Stir until mixture dissolves.

**Mixes best in hot flavoured drinks (coffee), or blended in a smoothie**

settings.title: The Difference Between Like & Love
settings.subtitle: Good genes only take you so far. Use our antioxidant-rich Vitamin C Serum to brighten and protect your skin against future damage.  A few minutes a day with a premium skincare lineup – um, one that actually works—and you're on your way to dreamy skin.

settings.title: What is Vitamin C Serum?
settings.text: Unlike other products with much less antioxidant oomph, our serum contains 20% Vitamin C. It's formulated that way, so there's a noticeable difference in the way your skin looks and feels. We’ve taken everything you love about this powerhouse vitamin and combined it with a dose of hyaluronic acid to plump the skin and give you that good-skin-day smile.

settings.title: Key Benefits
settings.text:
•  Promotes tighter, more youthful-looking skin

•  Reduces appearance of brown spots/ hyperpigmentation

•  Fast absorbing with no sticky residue

settings.custom_html: See What Our Customers Are Saying

settings.benefits:
■ Optimized for luminous, youthful-looking skin

■ Promotes healthy collagen production

■ Transforms a dull complexion

■ Supports elasticity
settings.ingredients: Deionized Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Aloe), Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Methylsulfonylmethane (MSM), Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide (Botanical Hyaluronic Acid), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel), Carbomer, (2s)-2-Amino-5- guanidinopentanoic Acid, Kosher Vegetable Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba Oil), Phenoxyethanol, Ethyl Hexyl Glycerin, d-alpha Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola Extract), Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail Plant Extract), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium Extract), Taraxacum Officinale (Dandelion Extract)
settings.how_to_use:
1. Apply a small amount of serum to dry, just-cleansed face and neck

2. Avoid direct contact with eyes

3. Allow time to absorb before applying moisturizer

settings.subtitle: Customize this section

settings.custom_html: See What Our Customers Are Saying

settings.testimonial: “This product is AH-MAY-ZING! I was so nervous to try it. I finally got it and it's NOT BAD AT ALL! I was SO impressed when I received this roller. It was sterile packaged and just very neat and clean looking”
settings.name: Beauty L.

settings.testimonial: "I ordered this with the derma roller and I’ve been using it twice daily. My skin seems brighter and my dark spots look to be fading which makes me SO happy. Looking forward to seeing future results.”
settings.name: Erin T.

settings.testimonial: “After only 1 use, I can already tell a major difference in my face! I followed up with Sdara Vitamin C Serum and was wonderfully surprised at the results this morning. I can't wait to see how my skin progresses over the next few weeks.”
settings.name: Kam K.

settings.title: Blissed Out Skin.
settings.subtitle: All-day radiance ― one simple routine.

settings.title: Hello, Gorgeous.
settings.content:
Enhance your daily routine with our natural skincare line.

We’ll get you the healthy, glowing, alive skin you’ve always dreamed of. Promise.

settings.title: Pick the Frequency
settings.text: Our flexible options let you decide how often you’d like your products to ship, from twice a month to once every 3 months - it's your decision! We believe that you’ll see optimal results when enjoying our products on a consistent routine, so why not plan ahead and save!

settings.title: Set It & Forget It
settings.text: We know how busy you are – so after you subscribe, we’ll take care of the rest. You don’t need to worry about running out of what you love, and can concentrate instead on your life.

settings.title: Save 20% On First Order
settings.text: Recurring payments will be made to your account based on your subscription frequency. Plus, shipping within U.S. is always free with our subscription!

settings.title: Get Free US Shipping
settings.text: There is no commitment once you subscribe, and subscriptions can be cancelled any time (as long as its 5 days prior to your next scheduled order). We always let you know in advance by sending an email reminding you of upcoming subscription renewals.
